description: Classic KBC lottery scam where victim has 'won' prize money but must pay registration/processing fee to claim it.

turns.scammer_message: ðŸŽ‰ CONGRATULATIONS! ðŸŽ‰ Your mobile number has been selected in KBC Jio Lucky Draw! You have WON Rs.25,00,000 (25 Lakh)! Contact KBC office immediately to claim your prize!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: lottery_reward | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: excited
api_response.agentResponse: hello sir... i just got this msg on my phone... is it really true i won 25 lakh?? i am pushpa verma retired teacher... i never bought any ticket so i am confused... how do i contact the office to get money? pls help me beta i dont know what to do

turns.scammer_message: Hello this is Aditya Sharma from KBC Mumbai head office. Your number was in our weekly lucky draw and you are the winner! I need to verify your details to process the prize money.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: lottery_reward | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: excited
api_response.agentResponse: namaste aditya beta... oh my god is this really true... 25 lakh is such a big amount for a retired teacher like me... i am shaking right now... but beta i live in delhi and i cannot travel to mumbai because of my bad knees... how will i get this money? do i need to go to my bank here?

turns.scammer_message: Very good! Your prize is confirmed. But first you need to pay Rs.5,500 as GST and registration fee. This is government rule, without this we cannot transfer 25 lakh to your account.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: lottery_reward | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: excited
api_response.agentResponse: oh ok beta i understand... government rules are strict i know... i have money in my saving account... but i dont know how to send to mumbai... my son put phonepe on my phone but i am scared to use it... tell me step by step where do i send this 5500? give me teh details beta

turns.scammer_message: Pay registration fee to our official KBC UPI: kbc.prize.winner@axl. After payment share screenshot and your bank details so we can transfer 25 lakh within 30 minutes!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: lottery_reward | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: excited
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am trying to do it... i typed kbc.prize.winner@axl in the app... but i am very scared of making mistake with money... when i type it what name should appear on screen?? i want to check before i press pay button... pls tell me correct name so i know it is going to right place

turns.scammer_message: If UPI problem then pay to Phonepe number 9123456789. Name will show Lottery Services. Or visit our website http://kbc-prize-claim.co.in to pay online. But do fast, offer valid for 1 hour only!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 5 | Extracted: 0 bank accounts, 1 phones, 1 UPIs, 1 names
api_response.agentResponse: okay i am calling that number now, hold on...
